column1: Funeral services will be at 2:00 p.m. Tuesday
column3: 2015 at First Church with Bro. M. D. Parmley and Bro. Wesley Wrenn Jr. officiating. Burial will follow at Pleasant Valley Cemetery under the direction of Roller-Crouch Funeral Home of Batesville.  Visitation will be from 12:00 to 2:00 p.m. at the church prior to the service.
